author: cnbc.com
title: Florida congressman adds name to list of GOP retirements
text:
Republican Rep. Dennis Ross of Florida says he will not seek re-election to a fifth term representing what is considered a strong Republican district.
The announcement from Ross came as House Speaker Paul Ryan said he will not seek re-election. It continues a spate of retirements from GOP lawmakers going into the mid-term elections.
Ross says he looks forward to returning to practice law and pursuing opportunities that encourage youth and young adults to engage in government.
Rep. Steve Stivers , the chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, says he's confident Republicans will retain the seat, "and we will do what it takes to make that happen."
